thread.title: Kirsten Dunst’s SAG Awards Dress Would Be Perfect for Her Upcoming Wedding
thread.title_full: Kirsten Dunst’s SAG Awards Dress Would Be Perfect for Her Upcoming Wedding

author: Janelle Okwodu
title: Kirsten Dunst’s SAG Awards Dress Would Be Perfect for Her Upcoming Wedding
text:
Kirsten Dunst’s SAG Awards Dress Would Be Perfect for Her Upcoming Wedding January 29, 2017 9:32 pm Expand Photo: Getty Images 
When Kirsten Dunst and her longtime partner Jesse Plemons announced their engagement earlier this month, many were left wondering what the always-chic actress might wear on her wedding day. The star appeared to be road-testing ideas at tonight’s SAG Awards , and stepped out in a frothy ruffled creation from Dior that was fit for a bride. With its sparkling white palette, crystal-embellished straps, and lingerie-inspired bustier neckline, the dress was completely in line with Maria Grazia Chiuri’s ultra feminine aesthetic and Dunst’s taste for intricately detailed fashions. Worn with layers of diamonds, beach waves, and a fiery red lip, the lacey gown was elegant without seeming fussy. 
Though it would only take the addition of a veil for Dunst’s Dior ensemble to go from red carpet to altar, it’s highly unlikely that the ultra-private star was providing the public with any hints about her wedding look. And yet her choice does offer a modern option for those in search of a dress that’s both romantic and understated. Brides-to-be, take note!
